# SEQ07 Instructions

## Description
Sequence 7 focuses on local centers

## Category
Towns

## Patterns
apl028, apl029, apl030, apl031, apl032, apl033, apl034

## Emergent Phenomena
Vibrant centers that draw people together for commerce, culture, and social interaction

## Overview
This sequence contains 7 pattern(s) that work together to create the emergent phenomena described above.
